mapper.insert: insert into t_bad_item(delivery_code,item_code,type,number) values(#{delivery_code},#{item_code},#{type},#{number}) on duplicate key update number = number + #{number}
mapper.select: select a.box_area, a.box_label, b.delivery_code, b.item_code, b.number, b.type from t_delivery a left join t_bad_item b on a.code = b.delivery_code
